com.palomamobile.android.sdk.message

Interface IMessageManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IServiceManager<IMessageService>

    public interface IMessageManager
extends IServiceManager<IMessageService>
    Methods in this interface provide convenient job creation methods that provide easy access to the underlying IMessageService functionality. App developers can either use BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob job instances returned by the createJob...() methods, or create custom jobs that invoke methods of the IMessageService returned by IServiceManager.getService()
    To get a concrete implementation of this interface call ServiceSupport.Instance.getServiceManager(IMessageManager.class)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      JobPostMessage createJobPostMessage(MessageSent message)
      Request to send a message to a friend identified by friendId as returned by the Friend service.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.palomamobile.android.sdk.core.IServiceManager

        getService

    • Method Detail

      • createJobPostMessage

        JobPostMessage createJobPostMessage(MessageSent message)
        Request to send a message to a friend identified by friendId as returned by the Friend service. The actual message must contain at least one of payload or url values. If both payload and url are set the content found at the url doesn't have to match the value of payload, especially since the content at the url can change over time. If only payload is set then service will create a url with content type "text/plain" containing the payload. When the request is completed an EventMessageSentPosted is published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus().
        Parameters:
        message - message to be sent

      • createJobGetMessagesReceived

        JobGetMessagesReceived createJobGetMessagesReceived()
        Async request to refresh the list of messages received by the current user. When the request is completed an EventMessagesReceived is published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus().

      • createJobGetMessagesSent

        JobGetMessagesSent createJobGetMessagesSent()
        Async request to refresh the list of messages sent by the current user. When the request is completed an EventMessagesSent is published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus().

      • createJobDeleteMessageReceived

        JobDeleteMessageReceived createJobDeleteMessageReceived(long messageId)
        Async request to delete a received message identified by messageId. Deletion of a message will publish EventMessagesReceived with an updated list of messages immediately after the local caches are updated (prior to any network access). Event is published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus().
        Parameters:
        messageId -
